name: Case Opener Guns
description:
The concept of the game is simple you have couple poor skins, and it’s your job to turn it into a powerful inventory. Simply click on the the case you wish to open. Collect money and open even more rare cases. Low on money? Sell some skins or open a free case. The better the skin, the more you will earn. The more you earn, the more skins you can purchase, and the more you can push the clock to develop your inventory faster.

Features:

• Cases - here you can choose the case or souvenir you would like to open. Simply click on the case you wish to open.
• Inventory - all your weapon and knife skins in one place. Review and sell your skins you do not want in your inventory by clicking on them.
• Market - purchase any weapon or knife of desired quality you want!
• The most realistic representation of opening
• A user-friendly interface
• Inspect Items
• Preview Skins
• Weighted Skins
